collection.name: WorkplaceRequests_(vw_cmj_all)
collection.prototype: SELECT id, timeOfMeeting, Module, self_1, self_2, self_3 FROM ( select RkkResourceMeetingsAM.id, RkkResourceMeetingsAM.module AS Module, RkkResourceMeetingsAM.timeOfMeeting AS timeOfMeeting, '<id>' AS self_1, ':' AS self_2, '</>' AS self_3 )
